column2: "Looks like we managed. Oh... but where are the Lillipans?"
"They're motioning over there, but it doesn't look like there's any way through."
"Then it looks like it's my turn!"
"Wait! I didn't ask you to do that. Why do you just run up and smash stuff?"
"Because I promised myself I would do my best."
"That doesn't sound like something a cast would say. And, for what it's worth, your best is pretty reckless."
"Gah! I got sand in my mouth..."
"Fortunately, nothing really bad happened. Plus, the path is clear now."
"What's this? A weapon? This is what you were looking for?"
"I think this is what the Lillipans wanted to show <%me>."
"But how did the Lillipans know about this thing?"
"\"Important\"... \"item\"... \"entrusted\"? Sorry, that's all I can make out."
"That's good enough. We got what we came here for."
"Okay, partner. Let's call it a day, then."
"第５章 砂に隠されたもの"
